products.title: Oslo Blackout Black Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Oslo Blackout Black Roller Blind in Black. Made to measure from £7.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple, bold and cohesive, our Oslo Blackout Black roller blind blends minimal style with practical design.  A firm favourite, our Oslo Blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - Whether its blackout roller blinds in the bedroom,  in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. 
 
At Swift Direct Blind, quality comes first.  Our roller blinds are expertly cut and assembled by our roller blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do our blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.

products.productdescription:
The Metz PVC Blackout patterned range, changes colour shades when light hits it, and offers a wide array of colours to choose from.  Waterproof and flame retardant, Metz fabrics are durable and practical. Vertical blinds offer optimal light and privacy control, so are a firm favourite in the UK, especially with overlooked houses and office.This understated black, marbled, Black blackout vertical blind is also great at blocking out light, so is a great option for rooms where screens feature, such as living rooms or offices, and due to it's waterproof fabric, is also a smart option for bathrooms or kitchensAt Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new vertical blind is made by our expert team, in our Yorkshire workshop, and comes with a FREE five year guarantee and customer-first aftercare.

products.title: Black (3009) (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Black (3009) (Blackout) Velux Blackout Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Blackout Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-Tex certified.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Available in 24 colours.
 	Installs in minutes.

products.title: Genesis Blackout Black Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Genesis Blackout Black Electric Roller Blind in Black. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Genesis Blackout range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. 
 
This black roller blind is effortlessly stylish and is also made from blackout fabric so will help to keep the light out of rooms when you want to keep them dark. The electric aspect of this blind makes it easy to use and perfect for those difficult to reach windows.
